COVID-19 Booster Shot: Study Says Half Dose Of Pfizer Vaccine Produces Strong Immune Response https://www.medicaldaily.com/covid-19-booster-shot-study-says-half-dose-pfizer-vaccine-products-strong-immune-response-471143 The team discovered that people who previously received AstraZeneca or Sinopharm COVID-19 vaccines had a "non-inferior" immune response when given a half dose of a Pfizer COVID-19 booster vaccine, comparable to those who received a full dose. https://www.medicaldaily.com/covid-19-booster-shot-study-says-half-dose-pfizer-vaccine-products-strong-immune-response-471143 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 05:00:27 -0500
